author: LiBrainian Core Team
agentDescription: Pytest testing patterns and fixtures. Use this when task intent aligns with tags: testing, pytest. Use this construction when an agent task matches pytest testing workflows and the team needs a repeatable, typed analysis contract. It cannot replace full runtime verification and does not guarantee correctness outside the provided input and capability constraints.

examples.description: Run pytest-testing for a relevant intent
